title: Ranielli
text:
Ranielli Jose Cechinato commonly known as Ranielli (born December 19, 1970) is a former <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>ian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Born in <a href="Curitiba">Curitiba</a>, Ranielli began playing football with <a href="Sociedade%20Esportiva%20e%20Recreativa%20Caxias%20do%20Sul">Sociedade Esportiva e Recreativa Caxias do Sul</a>. He played for Caxias until he joined <a href="Sociedade%20Esportiva%20Palmeiras">Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras</a> in 1990.
